documentation.text:
@title ImplementationDirectory
 @dev Implementation provider that stores contract implementations in a mapping.
@dev Emitted when the implementation directory is frozen.
@dev Mapping where the addresses of the implementations are stored.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot perform action for a frozen implementation directory"

arguments.value: Cannot perform action for a frozen implementation directory

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot perform action for a frozen implementation directory"

documentation.text: @dev Modifier that allows functions to be called only before the contract is frozen.

@dev Makes the directory irreversibly immutable.
 It can only be called once, by the owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot set implementation in directory with a non-contract address"

arguments.value: Cannot set implementation in directory with a non-contract address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot set implementation in directory with a non-contract address"

documentation.text:
@dev Removes the address of a contract implementation from the directory.
 @param contractName Name of the contract.
